eu.ehri.project.persistence

Class Serializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.ehri.project.persistence.Serializer

  • public final class Serializer
extends Object
    Class containing static methods to convert between FramedVertex instances, EntityBundles, and raw data.
    Author:
    Mike Bryant (http://github.com/mikesname)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Serializer.Builder
      Builder for serializers with non-default options.
